activities:
Event Management Solutions and Services

WEG collects registrations for events, in some cases we process payments. Once registered for an event WEG enables registrants to plan and manage their experience for the event through use of planning tools.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer Data, including name, email, address and some basic preference detail eg dietary requirements etc. In certain cases we collect credit card details and these are protected by globally recognized PCI compliance protections
privacyprograms:
PCI Compliance
Client Provided Privacy Programs
recoursemech: per the privacy statement; In the case of any dispute under this policy, WEG will cooperate and comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner to investigate any unresolved complaints
